content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received messages to install the "arcgis" module using "pip install arcgis" but encountered errors. I executed "pip install -U arcgis" multiple times and added the path to the module. I connected to ArcGIS Online, created a web map with a feature layer, and saved it as "River Map". I executed "pip list | grep arcgis" and "pip show arcgis | grep Location". I then received messages to execute shell and Python code, which returned empty stdout and stderr.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/arcgis"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "echo $PYTHONPATH"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/arcgis"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result')]
"""
